examples: Our confidence in the team has been seriously undermined by their recent defeats.
Nuestra confianza en el equipo se ha visto seriamente minada por sus recientes derrotas.
This crisis has undermined his position.
Esta crisis ha minado su posición.
Recent changes have undermined teachers’ morale.
Los cambios recientes han minado la moral de los profesores.
The director saw this move as an attempt to undermine his authority.
El director vio este movimiento como un intento de socavar su autoridad.
